rComments: Oprea is a boring teacher, lecutures are pointless and dont help you with the homework or tests. GO TO MSI.  TA's are worthless too,TA Aadil plays favorites when grading. Oprea is a nice guy but unavailable and unresponsive to emails.  He also gives extra points t those who show improvemnt. Fail the first midterm and Ace the final to get an A.

Oprea is hilarious and tries to make the material interesting. If you go to lecture, read, and actually DO the homework assigned you should have no problem. As for his teaching style: someone not smart enough to know that "nontrivial" examples are actually a GOOD thing should refrain from passing judgment (see below).

He means well but can't teach at all. His midterms and finals are easy but that's only if you make the effort to do your homework and go to section. I feel like I learnt more from reading the book than listening to him.

Oprea is a nice, funny, caring guy. That doesn't mean he won't fail you... he will, unlike many other professors in grad school. Spend 10 hours on each homework set and you'll be fine. Seriously, 10 hours. I hate working with other people, but you sort of have to for his classes. He's really a brilliant, nice guy, though.

He has a good understanding of the topic, but hasn't quite figured out how to teach. He didn't want to create visuals for his lectures(after they were requested), refused to give us sample test problems and is prone to rambling .  He doesn't turn his cell phone off and takes calls from his wife in class. This is unprofessional. He is a bit funny.
he's funny. but i have to agree that his way of teaching isnt helpful, especially if you're a visual learner. he hardly write stuff on the board. plain talking teaching style doesnt work for me =/

Funny guy.  The material was really interesting, but his way of teaching it was confusing and boring.  He wastes a lot of time on non-trivial stuff and isn't really prepared for class.  Midterm was tough too.

Oprea's the best! He is always available and is extremely accommodating. He even held an extra class on Saturday for review. Oprea is an enthusiastic lecturer and makes any material interesting. His class does require a significant amount of effort since his homework questions are time consuming and exams test your knowledge of the subject.

Professor Oprea was a great professor. Like everybody else says, he truly does care about his students. The class, was fun, interesting and clearly explained. He is funny and makes you want to attend each and every class. His test were hard but fair. If you study you will do fine.

Prof. Oprea is certainly the wise one! This is one of the best classes i've taken. He is funny, articulate, and truly cares about the students. The class is challenging, but not hard. A great learning experience.

Dr. Ryan is an great professor.  He truly cares about all the students.  He has an excellent command of the subjects he teaches and encourages students to broaden their thinking.  However,his exams can be a little tricky. Taking one of his classes is time well spent.

Dr. O rocks. He is an amazing teacher that really knows his stuff. He is always helpful and always ready to talk to students about questions. His classes are not easy, but they are also not hard. They are difficult topics so it can seem to be harder than your regular UCSC econ course. Go to Office hours and you will learn lots!
Great professor, really will challenge you, but is always available to help.  I was pushed really hard in his class but he was there every step of the way when I needed to ask questions.
Great professor, really will challenge you, but is always available to help.  I was pushed really hard in his class but he was there every step of the way when I needed to ask questions.

Class was hard to follow. Oprea is a funny guy but not very helpful. he tells you to be detailed and everything to completed up to you. but secretly he has certain expectations so your ideas are always wrong. this is not an easy class. dun take it for a W or elective. its extremely hard. the tests are impossible.
doesnt seem to care much about his students. go to his office hours if you feel like having someone act annoyed toward you.
